title: Hostel House-My Unforgettable Stay!!
text:
It was one of the best stays when it comes to Hostels from my experiences! And so far I only have traveled 30 countries. Amazing guest Rahul and his wife and adorable dog were bonus to the Breathtaking Landscape of Manali !! Rooms were super clean! Lines crispy White!( just like in 5star hotels!) Rahul came to retrieve me with my huge backpack from the are where I was left by taxi driver! Their helper Friend ( forgive me, I forgot his name) was another wonderful person who was helpful in every each way! They cook a very special Dinner and shared with Us-Guest!
Feelings of these precious Memories Nourishing me to Handle my Life in NYC!

Can‚Äôt wait to go back to Mother India!
Thank you to People like Rahul and his Team,  INDIA is beyond INCREDIBLE !!!!!!!!!ü´Äüí´üôèüèªAnnA Avagyan NYC

title: Gusde House
text:
The price was right for me to stay next door to my friends and the staff was excellent.   If you‚Äôre use to luxury I‚Äôd stay somewhere else; the bright photos on the website look new, comfortable, a magical. 
This place is dark n dingy at best.   Very misleading photos but fine for what I needed I suppose.   I booked 10 nights for under $350 USD
I only slept there about four or five total nights so I sorta didn‚Äôt get to use all the benefits of free breakfast and sort of wasted money; that‚Äôs my fault not theirs but I‚Äôd have booked somewhere even cheaper had I known the downfalls of this place.   Very friendly and trust worthy staff. I never locked a thing and was barely ever there to watch over my stuff. Sometimes it‚Äôs hard to find anyone depending on the hour but I would still suggest staying here for the price tag just don‚Äôt expect the Lap of luxury that the website promotes.

title: Not what I expected!!
text: The room was clean and the staff was kind but that was were it ended. We booked a deluxe room with sitting area and a balcony; what we got was a small room with a double bed on a wooden pallet and no windows!!! The sitting area consisted of a small glass patio table and a metal chair, also there was no hot water. When I showed the front desk my reservation with description I was told they did not have that room available however I did not see any balconies so I‚Äôm not sure if that room even exists... this hotel was really difficult to find as well. So if you are a backpacker and looking for an upgrade from a tent this is your place!!! I would not stay there again and was charged for all 5 nights even though they did not have the room as advertised. We left after 1 night.

title: My Experience at Extended Stay
text:
Hi my name is Michelle, I remember the very first time I chose to stay at an Extended Stay which was in Doral, oh my gosh‚Äù it was home, away from home.
It has been about (6) six years now, and no matter where I go, it has been and will always be ‚Äú Extended Stay Inn. Very clean atmosphere, clean linens, white clean fresh bath towels , dishes, pots and pans, all clean, bathroom, tubs, toilet and face bowls all clean and fresh.
Relaxation in the heart of stores, plaza, Resteraunt‚Äôs, banks whatever you‚Äôre needs may be, it will be met.
The staffs are very courteous, friendly, just professional. I am a Manager so I definitely know.
If you‚Äôre wondering where to stay and you have traveling plans, please don‚Äôt hesitate you be the judge choose Extended Stay, you‚Äôll see what I mean.

title: DO NOT USE THIS ‚ÄòSERVICE‚Äô
text:
There is no customer service with this third party booking company. My dates were messed up and after calling customer service immediately, I was told the booking would be corrected and this never happened. I was left to find a hotel last minute after my arrival. I could not get ahold of customer service (was hung up on after waiting several minutes TWICE!) My messages supposedly were never received. The hotel even told me they were having several issues with reservations booked through them! I have not received a refund and the rep I finally got to speak to AFTER my stressful trip was rude and useless. Use ANY OTHER SERVICE or just book directly through the hotel!

Almost a month later of trying to get someone from customer service with NO LUCK! No one has responded to my emails! I‚Äôm lucky if anyone answers the calls and those people are rude and unhelpful.

title: 411 a 62 st
text: Overall appearance of the room was clean and quiet. The street is a little busy but is expected this time of the year. The queen size bed is very uncomfortable.. with multiple areas that have dips with springs poking you making it impossible to get a good nights rest. It is not a ocean view room - which was one of the things we were looking  forward to was the fact that it said ocean view. The walk to the beach is pretty far and wouldn‚Äôt recommend it when it‚Äôs hot out. Beware when it rains because of landing water and there really isn‚Äôt a place for your pet to go to the bathroom.  Be sure to bring trash bags, dish detergent and a extra fan because the AC unit is not equipped to cool the space when temps are above 80. The bathroom door must be left opened or your literally sweat to death just washing your hands due to the heat that comes in through the sky light.

title: I Love the Hyatt but...
text: I was happy with most of the staff with an exception of a few unfriendlies. I like the fact that they want to be at your service but the mandatory bellhop (requiring a tip) can be annoying. I love to be served but I was running out of tip money. Also, having to call for items we forgot and then those items not coming was aggravating. I loved the fact that they offered full sized water bottles but was disappointed that we sent my daughter‚Äôs friend to grab some and they would only give her one. We all had to be present? Silly. The Hyatt is my favorite hotel, always comfy, friendly service and clean, staff attentive. I would stay here again. I only mentioned a few things that fell short because I assume you want my honesty.

title: If you need a few hours sleep near Incheon, this place is perfect
text: I had a 14 hour connection at ICN and did not want to stay at a capsule room in the airport transit hotels or pay hundreds of dollars at the Grand Hyatt for such a short stay. I just wanted to get a breath of fresh air and a good night‚Äôs sleep. This place was just perfect. It‚Äôs a quick taxi ride from the airport, located just a few minutes away in a nice suburban neighborhood. The hotel itself is no-frills, what more do you need for an airport layover? Basic but quite comfy. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. There is a fantastic local Korean restaurant next door, as well as convenience stores, coffee shops, etc. I left at 5 am and a taxi was waiting right outside. Just perfect. Thank you, Hotel Hu!

title: Convenient location, very friendly staff!
text:
I stayed in more luxurious hotels in London, that‚Äôs for sure, but all together it was a nice spot and the reception girl was oh so kind and helpful! The hotel location is extremely convenient to train and tube connections. Our room was located in the basement. No exciting view but we were not bothered as the room was spacious, clean, totally silent at night and it featured a very good working air-conditioning which was a true blessing during the heat weave in July 2018. We had no breakfast in the morning so I can‚Äôt rate it. 
The location is perfect, very close to Paddington train station and a couple of other metro stations. Hide Park is just a few min. walk and we rented a bike nearby to cycle to lovely Notting Hill. I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends who wish value for money.

title: Amazing location. Too many details not taken care of.
text: Great location. We arrived at midnight for our night stay. Made it to the room. Took a bath and started getting ready to sleep. No lock on the main door , nor security tool to prevent others to come in. Wifi did not work. Not available. No TV. It was making a horrible clicking sound all night long. Although the linen appeared to be clean there was a stench of water damage/dust accumulation. No literature on the previously mentioned equipment tot working. Twice we had people come in the room uninvited and had no way of keeping them out. We decided to lean a chair against the main lock for security. Other than than apartment was good sized, amazing views, great location. Right next ro the beach, restaurants etc. We were out of there before 9am, the most expensive one night sleep ever!! Will not return.

title: Review
text: We had the best stay ever in the Giuseppe‚Äôs place during our vacation in Catania, we really enjoyed it and it had everything we needed. It was comfortable and beautiful. We would totally recommend it if you are coming to Catania. It is located in the safe area and is very close to all the attractions and you will be able to walk everywhere. I have to mention that our host Giuseppe was wonderful and kind, he helped us out about everything and was always available for any kind of questions or recommendations. One last thing, because we were staying during the summer I have to mention that it was pretty hot outside, but AC worked perfectly in the apartment. All the best!

title: Great location
text: Great location just across the street from the ocean and easy walking to the south to aquarium. My  room was clean and fresh. The thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff. All of the people are incredibly helpful and generous with their time and advice. In the mornings, we had complimentary breakfast with the best service and an amazing ocean view. We were greeted with a tour of the house (super old and creaky house with a lot of character and antiques), a charcuterie board, and different choices of wine - complimentary, of course. This place have a game room with a pool table and ping pong. I would definitely come back her my boyfriend and I enjoy our stay. Also no Tv in your room.

title: Apples and then oranges üßê
text: I booked accommodations for a weekend trip at a very nice location in Georgia several years ago. I was really looking forward for some much needed ‚ÄúMe Time ‚Äú. Unfortunately a death in my family happened and I had to cancel the trip. Sooo, I called ‚ÄúBooking‚Äù to cancel my reservation and the process was just one big headache. They would not work with me and were going to charge me for the booking anyway. The policy on canceling my reservation was not what they said it would be. I had to cancel my debit card and get another one with a new number in order so that I would not be charged for the booking. Headache for sure. Do what you want but it didn‚Äôt work out for me.

title: Good when it works, but if not, customer service is a joke
text:
I was charged too more money than I signed up to pay for a specific booking. I contacted the ‚ÄúPriority Support‚Äù as I am a ‚ÄúGenius level 3‚Äù member, after waiting more than 10 minutes for each of two calls, the calls lasted about 10-30 seconds and the line fell both times. The chat function also took more than 10 minutes. I was offered a joke of a 25 euro discount on my next booking for my trouble, and since I was not happy, customer service just never submitted, so I didn‚Äôt even get that. 

Great app for finding hotel reviews, but then just go a book directly with the respective hotel you find. I thought a good reason to use Booking would be to have a party to help in case hotels make strange charges, but it turns out it is booking itself that sometimes cheats people‚Ä¶

title: Please, more information about the rooms
text: It‚Äôs an excellent app, you‚Äôre free to book, cancel, rebook and they‚Äôre quite honest. Sometimes they even describe the neighborhood and restaurants nearby. But I‚Äôve made many unpleasant and/or uncomfortable bookings because of misleading or lack of information about the room itself. My suggestion is that they should display more detailed pictures of specific room types. I hate when I try to visualize the room I‚Äôm booking and most of the displayed pictures show breakfast foods, or the lobby, among just a few pictures of the rooms. In one of my searches I found a room type called ‚Äúdeluxe‚Äù and that‚Äôs it - no more description or pictures.

title: Perfect quaint hotel
text: Absolutely love this place! We were greeted by the receptionist when we drove up. She made sure I had successfully downloaded the app and got my key. We got straight into our huge room with kitchen. It was clean, cozy, plenty of room for 3 teens & 2 adults.  Full kitchen and balcony to our room. All amenities provided. Super cute outdoor things to do, old 80‚Äôs video games, amenity room, fire pit which we ended up staying at way too late because we enjoyed meeting other guests while hanging at the fire and our kids ran around the place. It kind of felt like a travel hostel. I say this in a good way. Don‚Äôt let that word scare you. It is a great experience and place to stay!

title: Great for flights and hotels but shady taxi business
text:
I was originally happily surprised how intuitive the app is to use and if it ended there then I would have happily given this app 5.

The only reason I‚Äôm rating right now is because I think their taxi service practices is a bit shady. 

Long story short I booked a taxi using bookings 6 months ago and it was confirmed but couple of days before flying I could not get to the taxi website to make sure everything was accounted for.

Talking with customer service they told me that apparently I got declined due to not having enough taxis in the place I wanted to go. However I did not receive a cancellation email and in my bookings app/emails it still listed as confirmed. He said that I can get a refund if I decide not to use it. Which then begs the question‚Ä¶ why did I still get charged when the service cancelled on me? Not only that, I didn‚Äôt even know I was declined until my conversation with customer service. I decided to get refunded for the taxi just cos I didn‚Äôt want the headache of trying this again.

I want people to know this happened as I don‚Äôt want other people to lose money or worst travel and realize that their transportation isn‚Äôt there! I recommend booking your transportation somewhere else.

title: Zero stars
text: My experience was horrible.  I booked with a property that was allowed to receive bookings, even though they had no availability.  Then they had the audacity to take prepayments.  Then I was told I would have to wait 7-12 business days to receive a refund (which during the end of the year could mean about 3 weeks or more).  I told them I didn‚Äôt want a refund, I wanted credit so I could just rebook using what I already paid.  They said I would have to rebook with another property but they couldn‚Äôt give me credit.  I would have to pay again and send them invoice and then they would refund me any extra money that was spent (which take even longer and makes zero sense) .  This is very unprofessional and horrible.  I would suggest you use Airbnb.  At least they try to help you.  Use another app and if you do use this app never prepay for a booking.  Never ever.  Heed my warning.

title: What a lovely place!
text: My husband and I had a great time at A Painter‚Äôs House. The owners of the property have continued the artistic tradition started by the painter P√©ricl√®s Pantazis who lived there in the 19th century. The courtyard and the interior of the building are very tastefully decorated and arranged. The apartment is remarkably quiet even though it is located in the middle of the lively district of Plaka on the slope of the Acropolis. On foot, A Painter‚Äôs House is minutes away from most antique sites, from restaurants, and from shops. It is also within half an hour walk of Lycabettus Hill and some major museums. So all very convenient. I should mention too that our arrival was made very easy and pleasant by the clear information provided prior to our stay.

title: Nice stayüëç
text: The room was perfect, very clean and well organized‚Ä¶ only a few complaints ‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs a room sleeps 4‚Ä¶ which is 2 full size beds.. so not really for 4 adults or even 2 adults to sleep on 1 bed.. we stayed on the first floor and the room on top of us .. OMG walking ALOT at midnight‚Ä¶ and again from 7-8am walking back and forth.. we could not enjoy a sleep in before check out. How much walking can somebody do.. other than that.. the room and location were perfect.. my husband and I used it as a little getaway just to relax from kids at home. My biggest complaint was the people over over us.. like sit down somewhere. I‚Äôm writing review right before check out‚Ä¶ more than 1 hr 15 mins of EARLY morning walking. and still going

title: Amazing Experience!!
text:
Very great hotel staff!! From the moment we arrived. We arrived around 1pm and they let us check in our room early. As soon as we checked in they gave us our room card and we were off to the room. The rooms are very decent, they don‚Äôt look outdated. They look very nice and modern form the bathroom and sink mirrors.

 The beds are comfy. They have microwave, fridge and coffee in the rooms. They also have an ice machine in the building. They do provide free continental breakfast, very good breakfast. Bagel, cheese, sausage, yogurts, milk, coffee, nutrigrain bars etc. very great hotel. The pool is beautiful and large. Gym, pool bar, snacks. 

Concierge Rebecca super amazing. She has all the information you need. Some many things too do!! She reserved us a dinner cruise, scooter, jetski, parasailing, kayaking, paddle boarding etc. she has all the package deals!!  With drinks and food included.  It was my anniversary and this place exceeded our expectations. Rebecca provided excellent service as well as the front desk ladies. 

Everything is so close to this hotel!! Highly recommend!! If your looking for package water sports activities this the place!! They also provide free shuttle service to downtown, thats were all the activities will be at!

title: Removed features make the app worse
text: Booking used to be my go-to app whenever I was planning holidays. USED TO BE. Not anymore. They have changed former excellent features, and this has made the app worse. Two examples: (1) ‚ÄúDraw map‚Äù - I loved this function because it allowed me to draw a map and see only hotels inside my map. They removed this feature. Now every time I look for hotels I need to go through irrelevant results because their other location features are not accurate. (2) Filter by price - in the past you had a sliding bar and you were able to select your price range (from X to Y). Now you can‚Äôt. Instead, the app gives you predetermined ranges that in many cases are completely irrelevant for you. You end up with a lot of crap results that you don‚Äôt care about because they are either below or above your price range. Booking just keeps getting worse!

title: Disgusting
text: This place is absolutely disgusting! First the property is horrible looking nothing like the pictures shown at all ! Then we get the keys to the room and the door wouldn‚Äôt open but had a whole In the bottom that you could see thru ! We asked for another room and it was so bad , cigarette burns all over the sheets and blankets , MOLD everywhere ( I have copd ) Dirty tissues on the floor , dirt dust on floor and beds they looked like they weren‚Äôt cleaned in months , sink falling off the wall ! Absolutely unacceptable! The website needs changed asap ! We drove 3 hours away for the races and got stuck finding a hotel because of this place ! We went back up to the front desk and the lady informed us that the place is old and the doors are old but the cigarette smell is coming from the outside because of the hole in the door ? They knew about everything but just brushed it off like it was normal ! So do not rent you will be sorry !

title: Our trip the PITTS family
text:
I loved the staff I enjoyed my stay there is was beyond amazing  I‚Äôd definitely book again. Niko was beyond beautiful I give home twenty gold stars luv him and also Nate the bartender by the pool what An intelligent respectful man he showed all the guest love and kindness  we felt like we were leaving family behind literally

But here is the part that‚Äôs in need of improvement my housekeeper gave us our same towels she folded them and but them back up she made the beds up without changing out bedding for the whole five days we also had to go to the desk for towel for four people and also the rooms for four people at thirteen hundred bucks the maids could have been better and the beds should be bigger for four people to share that‚Äôs it

OTHERIWSE IT WAS SUPER CLEAN AND SUPER CUTE AND DEFINITELY A PLACE WED GO AGAIN EVERYTIME WE ARE IN MIAMI VAJERO HOSTLE U WAS AMAZING 

WE WILL SEE YALL AGAIN 

HOPEFULLY  WE WILL BE  PENTHOUSE IN OCTOBER 

TO ALL THE STAFF THERE 

WE LOVE ALL YOU GUYS AND THANKS FOR HIVING US A AWESOME STAY 

ANOTER MOMENT AND FEELING THATS UNFORGETTABLE 

THATS OUR MOOD FOREVER AND EVER

STAY HERE GUYS AND WIN NOTHING WLSE MATTERS BUT KINDNESS AND LOVE 
AND THEY SHOWED JUST THATüíãüíãüíãüíãüíãüíãüíãüíãüíãüíãwith all of our love myrna PITTS room 204 and family see ya soon

title: Easy to use and lower prices than most other sites
text: Although I found lower prices on Airbnb, I didn‚Äôt find lower prices on any other hotel discount sites and I checked all discount sites that I could find. The website is easy to use and intuitive. The site w emails confirming everything and has a special iPhone selection where I can upload the information about my stays to my iPhone in the  location I choose that‚Äôs most convenient for me, which I love.  The feature also makes it easy to check in at hotels & get information I need.  I would recommend this app to all my friends and anyone looking to book a lower price on a hotel!!!

title: Palapa house San Pedro
text: My wife and I spent 18 days at the palapa house for our 20th anniversary. We absolutely loved it. We stayed in one of the smaller rooms in the 3rd floor. It fit our needs and life style. The Palapa House is in the heart of San Pedro. Plus your 75 feet from the sea. There were local food everywhere and multiple restaurants within less the 5 min walking distance. Miss Clara (house keeper) was  absolutely amazing. She was willing to answer any questions we had and was one of the friendliest ladies we have ever met. We would talk about local venders we should go to if we want traditional Belize food and different parts of the island we should see. I‚Äôd absolutely suggest people going to the palapa house.

title: Loud toilet and a rock hard bed
text: We‚Äôll never stay here again. So disappointed in this Hampton as we‚Äôve stayed at other Hampton Inn hotels and they were great. Not only was the price for value ridiculous, but the beds were like laying on a board that had sheets on it. The pillows were like laying your head on nothing. Ever flushed a toilet on an air plane? Well, that‚Äôs the same sound the room toilet makes-even at 2 am when your partner/party is sleeping and will wake them up! No regular coffee was available during the breakfast hour. We had to wait for it to brew. Not a good experience at all and really disappointed that we spent close to $200 for a very poor nights sleep. I told the desk staff about our experience and they just said, ‚Äúoh, sorry to hear that‚Äù. Never again at this location

title: The best place to stay in Giza!
text: We had the best experience ever in this place with Franco (the owner) and all the staff. This place has many positive things, starting with the owner who help you with everything and answer all the questions that you have. The view to the pyramids are amazing, the food delicious and the place is very clean and cozy. We don‚Äôt just stay in a hotel we found a new friend in Egypt with Franco. We don‚Äôt have words to describe the people that we met. If you are thinking to travel to Egypt, stay here you gonna have the best experience ever. Thank you so much Franco and all the people who are working there, they have an space in our hearts and mind forever.

title: Do not recommend
text: This is a horrible app. I downloaded to book a trip and when I paid, it said the payment didn‚Äôt go through and I needed to put in a second card number, which I did to get the booking. However, after contacting my bank and the hotel I found out that the first payment had already went through. Had to call three times to get the second card removed. During the ordeal, I realized that less than 24 hours after I made my booking the price of the room went down $50 dollars. They said they price match, so I sent an email and attached the two prices, but they wouldn‚Äôt refund me until after my stay. After my stay, I had to email the invoice and booking # TWICE to get the refund which isn‚Äôt even added back to the charged card but added to the wallet on the app. Would have been cheaper and less of a head ache to book directly through the hotel. Pointless and a waste of time

title: Summit cove 3026
text:
The place is amazing. You can see your family skiing literally right outside your window. Lift is super duper close. The place is spacious and clean. It does provide a starter of everything. I‚Äôd suggest bring your drinks and groceries because the nearby small stores don‚Äôt offer much. 
Only thing that was bad for us, the elevator was not working through the duration of our 3 day stay. So carrying things up and down was hard. Specially with a baby and loaded with snow gear. 
Also the parking garage is tight! Very tight! While it is great for people with cars, if you own a truck it will be a bit of a challenge. 
Once in the room though, there are no complains, spacious, clean, worth the proximity of the lift and keeping your family close!

title: Booked Entire Paris & Italy 3 Weeks No Issues
text:
We booked our entire Paris & Italy 3 weeks on Booking with zero issues. All properties responded very quickly when messaged. When booking the accommodation will put a hold on your card and only charge it when you stay or default on the no refund dates you selected. I will use this app in the future because they made my trip go smoothly.

For Booking‚Äôs IT crew, I had one glitch after a stay and that was that the hotel had their booking acct hacked and the hacker click baited me. I didn‚Äôt click, but let the property know. They were thankful and apologetic. As with everything on the internet, use common sense.

title: Terrible app coupled with terrible customer service.
text: Me and my friends wanted to go to California for spring break so I booked a $250 room with booking. Turns out when I had chosen the date it had not saved after I had exited the in app calendar, instead it had booked me for that day instead of the date I wanted. I called the customer service and all the lady would tell me was that it wasn‚Äôt their fault because they were following the hotel policy. It wasn‚Äôt the hotel that was at fault, it was booking. They refused to give me a refund or book me for another date. Realizing i might be the one at fault, I went through the process again to make sure that I had done everything correctly. I entered the date I wanted again and exited the calendar and it went back to that day instead of the weekend I wanted. I have now lost $250 to company that will not take responsibility for their mistake. I will refuse to use this service ever again.

title: Hotel park palace , Florence
text:
A Very nice botique hotel in Florence in a fabulous location . 10 min walk to the South Gate of ancient Florence  and  Boboli gardens , about 15 min walk to michael Angelo square . Beautiful location amidst lush greeneries !  It sits on top of a hill, so the landscape from the hotel windows we see is very Serene! 
They have great breakfast buffet served every morning on the patio overlooking a nice pool .  The people There are very nice and  had great service and made every effort to make our trip very memorable!  It feels like we are staying in an Italian villa with our own private formal living and dining, patio , pool and front courtyard  ! 
Would love to come back and stay here and highly recommend for friends and family !!

title: Old San Juan Guest House‚Äîthe best
text: Just had the pleasure of staying a week at the Old San Juan Guesthouse.  First, the owner, Mamma is absolutely the friendliest person and most helpful.  No wonder her daughters Vivian and Marley who handles the reservations a d details for your stay are great to work with.  The facility is so convenient to everything is within a short walking distance. Eating establishments all around, shopping next door, historical church across the street. Just blocks to the cruise ships.  The walls are very thick once you close the doors you hear no outside street noise.  Will I stay here again without a doubt.  Just booked for February.  My new favorite place to come.  Enjoy the Old San Juan and be a part of it.

title: Nice place needs a little maintenance
text:
We were actually in the area for the Special Olympics so while our children were with the team we could enjoy our free time!  My complaint is the day before arrival I‚Äôm told the television and hot tub do not work.  I booked this place for us to relax and watch the Super Bowl game while in the hot tub.  We had to change our plans.  I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs right to advertise and the amenities were not working.  We should have been told earlier so that we could have an option to book somewhere else if we wanted.

 We traveled in from Nashville.

Other than that; the place is actually very nice.  Just needs maintenance on a few areas we communicated to the owners group - Carolina Experience.

title: BAD , DO NOT COME HERE
text: I was not able to check in on time because the man in the front desk said ‚Äúno one wanted to show up to work‚Äù so he did not know how to check us in . Once we came later to get our room , we went up and the washer and dryer was in the middle of the kitchen unplugged. I called them on the phone several times but they did not answer so I went down in person. I told the lady at the desk the issue, and all she said was someone was going to come in 30 minutes. I asked if I could get a new room because that was ridiculous and she said no. Also, one of the toilets was not working and the water from the shower was very hot , it burned to shower . I called them and they answered this time and they said I had to wait until the guy came because he comes in at 5‚Ä¶. I then proceeded to ask For a different room but she still refused . This is awful service and I will not return .

title: Going to visit my parents
text:
I have stayed at this hotel twice now! It‚Äôs the half way point between me coming from Illinois to visit my parents in Florida! 
It is has good parking and well lit! I am battling breast cancer, yet again and to be able to get a room on the first floor and near the door has been perfect for me! I stay in a suite. I bring my tea pot and things with:) The rooms are comfortable and clean! The staff has gone above and beyond for me! I travel alone and I go through 5 states before I reach my folks place! The place is family friendly as well as for us going solo! 
The staff is nice and kind! 
I highly recommend Homewood Suites, located in Brentwood, TN. If your on your way south or to Florida! It‚Äôs the perfect mid way location and easy to get back onto the highway from there! Except this time! Major construction! I‚Äôll need to head out early going back home! It took me twice as long, this trip, due to the construction! Holy Cow, south bound traffic has to move over into the North bound side and it felt like 3-4 hours of slow white knuckled driving! Lol.
All my best to those who travel and a Very Merry Christmas To All! 
Susie

title: Spectacular Customer Service
text: This has to be one of my favorite stays in my traveling history. My flight landed very early and i arrived at the hotel early as well but thanks to Daniel who made my birthday started well by checking me early. His smile and patience was superb; the room was everything I needed and hoped for. The breakfast was very good had many options; the receptionist at the welcome desk were always friendly and helpful, Ruth and Janet were always willing to help me going above and beyond to make sure I‚Äôm okay. This was my first time in Germany (Munich) and I enjoyed my Birthday trip. The hotel wasn‚Äôt too far from the shopping and touring district. Overall amazing experience.

title: Great stay in Cypress Tx.
text:
What a trip we have had. Every great trip starts and ends with a great stay. The Huge Captivating Modern 5bdr home has worked out perfectly for our family get together. It is 20 minutes away from all our needs which has been great. The home is equipped with all the amenities needed to come on in and think your right at home. Big you ask? Everything is big in Texas. The house has 5 bedrooms and 3 baths. It has worked out perfectly for our 9 family members. Thanks again to the owners of this wonderful home and allowing my family to have a great Texas experience. We would definitely stay here again. 
James

title: Travelodge needs help
text: This Travelodge needs serious help with it rooms. Sink basins need replacing and bathrooms need repairing. Air conditioners need updating. The rooms need updating to accommodating technologies such as USB Power bases on lamps and walls. Plumbing is jacked up. Elevator is in the wrong location if disabled this not the place to be. You come here make sure you get a front side room on the first floor if you are ADA. Dingy linens and towels, lights don‚Äôt work drug dealers in the back of the parking lot(I witnessed that), no way to get ice. The doors have gaps in the frames when they are closed, that‚Äôs a safety/security issue. They don‚Äôt know ADA law, My bathroom did not have rails in it Furniture needs updating, they stuck in the 1980‚Äôs with the basic 12 button telephone. This is the worst hotel I have ever been in. I can‚Äôt do this hotel again until they get it together. I travel for work a lot but this here takes the cake for lodging failure. The place is ghetto for real just upgrade ghetto.

title: Charming with great location
text: This is a small hotel with big heart! Valentina is a great hostess and was extremely helpful to us. The croissants hanging on our door each morning were delicious and fresh. The hotel is located just minutes from the Pantheon and a near Trevi, Spanish steps and Piazza Navona. Our room was small but adequate. The welcome snacks were appreciated. The Juliet balcony was nice and the doors helped block out any street noise. Unfortunately we could hear most of the neighboring room said or did‚Ä¶and they usually came in a couple hours after our bedtime. This is a good choice for the historic center of Rome. We walked two times to Trastevere ‚Ä¶about a 25 min walk. The small elevator worked well but with luggage it‚Äôs a one person lift.

title: This app charged me 3 times for one reservation I made
text: The reason k am giving a one star is because i have always used this app too do a reservation at the beach but I did a reservation today and I didn‚Äôt receive any confirmation number and email or anything and in they had charged me 3 times and I tried calling them and everyone was so rude I called multiple times and there was one representative who said sorry we can‚Äôt help you and hanged up on me they was someone else who really helped me was really helpful but we couldn‚Äôt do anything to get my money back we tried but nothing and it says I haven‚Äôt made any reservations but they charged me 3 times it‚Äôs really weird ! Other than that I always do my hotel reservations here everything goes well but I don‚Äôt think I will use this app anymore after this .

title: Great apartment rental
text: I made reservations for a couple weeks here and soon after arriving I went to withdraw some money to complete payment for the rental. I was upset to find out that I had a fraud alert from my bank in the US and my bank froze my account. I explained this to management and they adjusted my unfortunate shortened stay and kindly refunded the difference. The apartment was very clean an we‚Äôll appointed, everything you need in both inside and outside kitchen‚Äôs, linens, fridge microwave etc. I‚Äôm not happy about cutting my vacation short but was pleased I choose to rent the apartment, it‚Äôs really close to all the action, just right down the road to Tamarindo beach! Thnx Oriana an Don

title: Great little surprise
text:
We were skeptical at first as we had never done a short apartment stay before. But much to our surprise we found the place so much more comfortable than a hotel room and the owner Matthew really pulled out all the stops to make a stay there great. There are all sorts of beach and family travel accessories in the apartment for your use. Beach umbrella cooler beach chairs and even a pack and play. We even thought about staying again upon our return from our cruise but will need to get moving to return home since return is early. 
Next time we return to the Fort Lauderdale we‚Äôre booking this again. 
Definitely a 10 star stay.

title: Home2 personal review
text:
The ladies working here where very nice and helpful, from the women in the front desk to the cleaning ladies everyone was great! 
It‚Äôs a very good value for price with convenient breakfast and our king suit was very specious with pretty much everything we need. I would say a family of 5 with kids would fit good here. Love the vanity lighting in the restroom. Over all Great size I like it!
The only one thing I didn‚Äôt like was the silver wear that was provided in the room it was rusty and I wouldn‚Äôt use it for my food... other than that I would stay here again, the building was very clean and it brought comfort and safety knowing that they take time to clean everything.

I love Booking and use it nearly every trip I take. I rarely fine cheaper rates and never a more user-friendly app. Compared to others, it‚Äôs clean, simple and intuitive. Really the only thing that cost them half a star is that I had a problem getting them to honor their rate match. There should be a better approach than sending them a link to the other rate as by the time they read my email, the other rate was gone as the hotel had sold out. Of course I should have gotten a screenshot, but it would be nice if that was part of their instructions. All in all, I have been a massive fan since I discovered Booking and any time I try another site, I‚Äôm reminded why Booking is best.

title: First time guest
text: This was our first time to stay at this hotel.  We selected it due to location which was perfect for the race we ran and access to the marina areas.  We had a pool view first floor room... would NOT get this again... no privacy and very loud.  They have some other pools and one that is quiet.. a room in that location would be great.  They have harbor view/front rooms but save the money... The rooms were clean and the bed comfortable.  I liked having a bottle of water  provided each night.  The hotel was very loud... doors shutting and guest who appear to have never stayed at a hotel yelled down the halls at all hours... I invested in some ear plugs.  Overall a good hotel, but there are others we like better.

title: Small room-loud heater!
text: I‚Äôm not one to write bad reviews but this motel was honestly not the best.  The room was WAY small and the rooms heater took forever to warm up too! To get to the closest you had to turn sideways and slide along side the bed squeezing all the way and I‚Äôm 5‚Äô2‚Äù and weigh 110 pounds.  The heaters knobs were broken and my husband had to use a tool to adjust the settings.  That wasn‚Äôt even the biggest problem either!! The heater made this horrible noise about every 5-10 mins so just as you would fall asleep that horrible noise would start happening! Both my husband and I had one of the worst nights sleep we had ever had due to this noise! Last but not least the breakfast they claim that comes free in the morning was not the best.  After attempting to eat their ‚Äúfree‚Äù breakfast we ended up going out to eat instead!

title: Fraud alert
text: When you cancel a booking one day prior to arrival and you are still charged for one nights stay this is fraud. The in app booking says one day prior. It is at this very moment still the day before. If these rooms were as represented but one of our party arrived early  said the rooms were dank smelling and smelled of smoke but supposed to be non smoking room and the acoustic ceiling was bubbled off ceiling and saw signs of mold we decided to cancel. To be charged for this place is all wrong. If not I will use social media to express my dismay. Likewise if I‚Äôm satisfied I will pass that forward too. Have a good night/day. Mine was not pleasurable so far. Perhaps you should scout these out and make a new section called lower than dive.

title: Luv this app!
text: It‚Äôs been amazing using this app through my travels around Asia the past 10 months.  Great that many hotels have last minute free cancellation options, which is soooo great for my spontaneity!  No hidden charges.  East app to access.  Only one thing that I would suggest.  Sometimes when it says ‚Äúno credit card needed‚Äù I learn when I get to the hotel that the hotel doesn‚Äôt actually take credit cards.  It should say on the page directly so we know beforehand.  I don‚Äôt travel with much cash so this situation has been an issue several times so far.  Overall, I recommend this site- very flexible and many choices! üòçüôèüèºüíï
